sf276:1: evaṁ mayā śrutam | ekasamayaṁ bhagavāṁ caṁpāyāṁ viharati gargarapuṣkariṇyās tīre |
sf276:2: tena khalu samayena rāhuṇā asurendreṇa sarvaṁ candramaṇḍalam āvṛtaṁ |
sf276:3: atha yā devatā tasmiṁ candramaṇḍale sthitā bhītā trastā saṁvignā hṛṣṭaromakūpā yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma | upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte ’sthāt | ekāntasthitā bhagavaṁtaṁ gāthayā babhāṣe |
sf276:4: namas te buddha vīrāstu vipramuktāya savataḥ |
sf276:6: loke sugatam arhantaṁ candramāḥ śaraṇaṁ gataḥ |
sf276:13: … | saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ | saṁtvaramāṇo ’sau rāhuś candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭaḥ ||
sf276:14: tena samayena baḍir virocanapautra āsīd asuraḥ | adrākṣīd baḍir virocanapautro rāhuṇā asurendreṇa tvaritatvaritaṁ candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭam dṛṣṭvā ca tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe ||
sf276:15: kiṁ nu saṁtvaramāṇas tvaṁ rāhuś candraṁ vimuñcasi | saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ ||
sf276:16: rāhur avocat || saptadhā me sphalen mūrdhā jīvan na sukham āpnuyāṁ tatra buddhābhigītena muñceyaṁ śaśinaṁ na cet ||
